item.description:
For February's dinner, let's go to Ichigo Ichi in East Providence.

This restaurant was suggested by a group member and several other members "liked the idea".

This is a hibachi and sushi restaurant ..  BUT  ..  I made our reservation at a hibachi table so we have to order off the hibachi menu.

I  have made a reservation in my name for 12 people.

Here's the website:

http://www.ichigoichieus.com/index.html

I ask you all to please review our group's policy for paying the bill at the end of the meal.

http://www.meetup.com/diningout-617/messages/boards/thread/10296825

There will be one bill for the table for the meals, tax and tip.  It will be divided by the number of attendees and each member will pay (preferably with cash) for that amount.  Each member is responsible to pay for their own liquor.

There will be no separate checks.  If you don't agree to this method of paying the bill, please don't sign up this this dinner outing.

I hope to see you there.  I'm looking forward to visiting this restaurant

group.name: Rhode Island Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: February Dinner - Ichigo Ichi in East Providence
